lines.text: Patterson!
came as soon as we could
hey, we heard over the scanners. WOO, what a mess. Look, if there's anything we could do to help
all you gotta do is ask
What are you two bags of shit doing here? You aren't cops no more
look man, we here trying to help
Hey, sweet pie. How's your cock working now that you ain't got a badge no more?
WHAT?
Here's what I think of *you fuck-up*
[spits in John's face]
you spit in my face!
[John tries to punch Patterson in the face, but Charlie stopped him]
Hey, you aren't going to hit him
Why not?
Cause, I'm gonna hit him
[Charlie tries to punch Patterson in the face, but John stopped him]
NO NO NO, your not going to hit him
WE BOTH HIT HIM
[John and Charlie punch Patterson in the face that sent him flying 25ft across the station platform]
No, you ain't gonna hit him.
Why not?
Because I'm gonna hit him!
[smacks a transit cop in the face]

[to Charlie]
Should we break this up? They're tuggin' at his collar for dear life over there.

[staggers towards platform women; pretending to be drunk]
Hey! Hey! That's my man! Get your hands off my man! Are you bitches crazy?
[pulls her sleeves and clenches her fists as she runs towards them]
You wanna get hurt, that's what it is!
We're sorry, we didn't know it was your man!
We're sorry, Merry Christmas to you!
[they get behind the turnstiles]

[tries to attack them]
Get the hell outta here! Yeah, you better run!

[to her friend as they leave the station]
It's your fault! You started it!
Me? I didn't start anything!

[to John]
I turn my back for one minute and you're doggin' me?
They were huuge!!

[back at the booth]
Oh, she's beautiful.

[positioning John on the poles]
Now, you wait right there, all right. You wait right there, and don't you let me see you talkin' to -
[John blows his nose with his hand]
You nasty.
[gives a male passerby a dirty look]
What you lookin' at? I could kick your ass, too. Shit.
Did I say that? I didn't say that! All I said was... bad things tend to happen around you two. Some money got lost and I think you two can help me find it.
How so?
You look for it!
